title: Pampangan - Genesis Portion
description: The Kapampangan people (Kapampangan: Taung Kapampangan), Pampangue√±os or Pampangos, are the sixth largest ethnolinguistic group in the Philippines, numbering about 2,784,526 in 2010. They live mainly in the provinces of Pampanga, Bataan and Tarlac, as well as Bulacan, Nueva Ecija and Zambales.
